com.att.aro.model
Class ScreenStateInfo

java.lang.Object
  com.att.aro.model.ScreenStateInfo

public class ScreenStateInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates information about the Screen State of the device.

Nested Class Summary
static class ScreenStateInfo.ScreenState
          The ScreenStateInfo.ScreenState Enumeration specifies constant values that describe the operational state of the device screen.

Constructor Detail

ScreenStateInfo

public ScreenStateInfo(double beginTimeStamp,
                       double endTimeStamp,
                       ScreenStateInfo.ScreenState screenState,
                       java.lang.String screenBrightness,
                       int screenTimeout)
Initializes an instance of the ScreenStateInfo class, using the specified beginning and ending timestamps, ScreenState value, screen brightness, and timeout value.

Parameters:
beginTimeStamp - The beginning timestamp from which the screen state information was captured.
endTimeStamp - The ending timestamp at which the screen state information was captured.
screenState - A ScreenState enumeration value that indicates whether the screen is On, Off, or in an unknown state.
screenBrightness - A string that describes the screen brightness.
screenTimeout - The screen timeout value.
Method Detail

getBeginTimeStamp

public double getBeginTimeStamp()
Returns the beginning timestamp for the screen state.

Returns:
A double that is the beginning screen state timestamp.

getEndTimeStamp

public double getEndTimeStamp()
Returns the ending timestamp for the screen state.

Returns:
A double that is the ending screen state timestamp.

getScreenState

public ScreenStateInfo.ScreenState getScreenState()
Returns the screen state.

Returns:
A ScreenState enumeration value that indicates whether the screen is On, Off, or in an unknown state.

getScreenBrightness

public java.lang.String getScreenBrightness()
Returns the screen brightness.

Returns:
The screen brightness expressed as a string.

getScreenTimeout

public int getScreenTimeout()
Returns the screen timeout.

Returns:
The screen timeout value.
